name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joseph Paul ZANOTTO, Appellant

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joseph Paul ZANOTTO, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph A. Massa, Jr., Public Defender, Warren, for appellant.
Paul H. Millin, Dist. Atty., Tionesta, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
369 A.2d 1224
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joseph Paul ZANOTTO, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 20, 1976.
Decided Feb. 28, 1977.
Joseph A. Massa, Jr., Public Defender, Warren, for appellant.
Paul H. Millin, Dist. Atty., Tionesta, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
